name: Sinful Catalyst CH1: Ethereal Camellia
description:
Sinful Catalyst is a dark fantasy visual novel with a puzzle/action battle system.
Gyulia is an exorcist who wakes up disoriented in the dark forest, the entrance to the underworld. At the beginning of his adventure, Gyulia meets Lilith, a succubus in charge of receiving the newcomers and enticing them to stay on the Second Circle. Our hero will have to choose to follow his lusty desires or try to find a way out, being pushed by either Ravi and Devi, two otherworldly beings each wanting a different fate for him.
Follow Gyulia's journey on the Second Circle, battle nasty butlers, and fall at the hands of the first Mistress, Lilith.
